Medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with eighteen lithographs, four etchings (two with aquatint), one photogravure, two woodcuts, one ready-made object (folder front), and reproductions.
Keywords: Frontispiece from Le Surréalisme en 1947: Exposition Internationale du Surréalisme
